md:
giải nghĩa từ "receding" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Receding (verb): to move back or away from something
	+ Meaning in Vietnamese: rút lui, lùi lại
	+ Example sentence: The army was receding from the battlefield. (Quân đội đang rút lui khỏi chiến trường.)
* Receding (adjective): becoming smaller or less noticeable
	+ Meaning in Vietnamese: thu nhỏ, giảm dần
	+ Example sentence: The receding hairline made him look older. (Dòng tóc thu nhỏ làm cho anh ta trông già hơn.)

Các từ liên quan:

* Recede (verb): to move back or away from something
* Recession (noun): a period of economic decline
* Recede (verb): to become smaller or less noticeable

Note: The verb "recede" can have different meanings depending on the context. In the first definition, it means to move back or away from something, while in the second definition, it means to become smaller or less noticeable.

  • Receding (adjective): becoming smaller or less noticeable
    • Meaning in Vietnamese: thu nhỏ, giảm dần
    • Example sentence: The receding hairline made him look older. (Dòng tóc thu nhỏ làm cho anh ta trông già hơn.)

Các từ liên quan:

  • Recession (noun): a period of economic decline
  • Recede (verb): to become smaller or less noticeable

Note: The verb "recede" can have different meanings depending on the context. In the first definition, it means to move back or away from something, while in the second definition, it means to become smaller or less noticeable.
